survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with AI-powered customer support services, focusing on effectiveness, ease of use, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you interact with AI-powered customer support?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you interact with AI-powered customer support?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered customer support features have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an option for those who haven't used any features.
